Articles.Content: And...let me know what you think of the new song

I'm always interested in meditation/relaxation music. It's very good, but a little too bright for my relaxation tastes. That said, I could most likely get into it as an afternoon relaxation piece. One that may energize me rather than relaxing me to possible sleep.
Relaxing, but for some reason, I find Imperial March more relaxing than this...
I'm not expert on music theory, but I think the problem is the tempo. It's too fast. I can't see any other reason to not be chill with this. It just feels 'bouncy.'
